creator: Bjarnason, Jóhann Magnús, 1866-1945. (author)
description: Bjarnason, Jóhann Magnús: 1866-1945. Emigrated from Iceland to Nova Scotia with his parents at age nine; became a schoolteacher in western Canada, 1889; after retirement lived at Elfros, Saskatchewan (Kirkconnell, Canadian overtones). // Contents: "Íslendingurinn"; "Maðurinn í fornfálegu yfirhöfninni"; "Hún dó af 'heart disease'"; "Steinn Steinsson"; "Vitskerti ritstjórinn"; "Litla stúlkan"; and "Ungu hetjurnar."
subject: Literary Works--Poetry, Icelandic
Poetry
Poetry
Poésie
title: Sögur og kvæði
